1de7bfba-7002-415a-94a0-0d64e79d4c4b.description: The Togetherall Trained Peer certification is awarded to participants who have applied their lived experience and mental health knowledge to support others in need. They have proven the ability to digest mental health issues through a digital platform and provide validation, support and empathy to individuals across the world.
1de7bfba-7002-415a-94a0-0d64e79d4c4b.name: Togetherall Trained Peer

badge_template_activities.title: The Togetherall Trained Peer certification is awarded to participants who have completed a minimum of 10 hours of peer support or a minimum of 50 supportive interactions on the Togetherall platform, have attended all Professional Development Roundtables offered by the Togetherall Senior Clinical Team, and have completed a mental health advocacy activity in their local community.

e3abc22c-256a-4981-ae16-8b56bc0cadfa.description: The Trained Peer Ambassador certification is awarded to graduates of the Togetherall Trained Peers Program who are passionate about mental health awareness and motivated to expand access to mental health support in their local community. They have designed and implemented a mental health advocacy strategy in their local community, helping to de-stigmatize conversations around mental health, spread awareness of available supports, and promote help-seeking.
e3abc22c-256a-4981-ae16-8b56bc0cadfa.name: Togetherall Trained Peer Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: The Togetherall Trained Peer Ambassador certification is awarded to those who have earned their Trained Peer Certification and have gone on to design and implement a customized mental health communications strategy in their local community. They utilized a promotional campaign brief model to develop their ideas and independently executed their concept over the course of 13 weeks.

e1084dcf-0a77-4a1d-a6bb-04a6a53aad5e.description: The Trained Peer Mentor certification is awarded to graduates of the Togetherall Trained Peers Program who have stayed on to mentor and support the next generation of Trained Peers. They have a demonstrated ability to facilitate group discussion and knowledge-sharing, provide guidance and inspiration, and foster a positive learning community. They have done this while continuing to provide person-centered peer support to members of a global, digital mental health community.
e1084dcf-0a77-4a1d-a6bb-04a6a53aad5e.name: Togetherall Trained Peer Mentor

badge_template_activities.title: The Togetherall Trained Peer Mentor certification is awarded to those who have earned their Trained Peer Certification and spent an additional 13 weeks as a mentor for the next generation of Trained Peers. They co-facilitated group, virtual Roundtable sessions alongside a lead Clinician to foster knowledge-sharing and development among participants. They also maintained a supportive, online community of practice for Trained Peers, providing ideas and answering questions in a digital space.
